title: Wyvren - Summoner Stats - League of Legends

embed.description: Wyvren / Diamond 2 0LP / 158W 145L Win Ratio 52% / Morgana - 34W 36L Win Ratio 49%, Cho'Gath - 15W 12L Win Ratio 56%, Zilean - 12W 9L Win Ratio 57%, Ahri - 8W 8L Win Ratio 50%, Blitzcrank - 3W 6L Win Ratio 33%

body:
Hey everyone, first time posting here and new to OCE. 

I transferred over from NA in August and have been playing casually while traveling. I'm currently sitting in DII and would like to see what the competitive scene is like here. I've played in many local and online tournaments in NA. I main support. I also have two other accounts remaining in NA, links included below for you to better understand my champion pool. If anyone would be interested in picking me up as a support for a tournament or other competitive game play please add and message me: Wyvren 

http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=Rust%20Slug
http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=SWED%20Allstar

replies.body: is your name supposed to be Wyvern? As in the lesser dragon class...
